Projek Transformasi Bilik Darjah Kelas Abad ke 21
=================================================

by [webmaster](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/sazizul/ "Posts by webmaster")
 | Apr 10, 2019 | [CSR](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/csr/)
, [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)
, [photo](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/photo/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/WhatsApp-Image-2019-04-05-at-6.48.46-PM-1080x675.jpeg)

Projek Transformasi Bilik Darjah Kelas Abad ke 21 oleh pelajar program Sarjana Muda Ukur Bahan di Tanjung Surat, Pengerang sempena Perasmian Service Learning Malaysia oleh YB Menteri Pendidikan pada 13 April 2019.

[more photos (click here)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/photos/2019/04/projek-transformasi-bilik-darjah-kelas-abad-ke-21/)
